topics.body:
*realizes I haven't updated windows on my computer in a while since I always use linux*
And now I remembered why I never use windows on my computer.  God updates take fucking forever on windows.  Legitimately for you windows users how do you deal with this shit?

"100000 bottles of beer on the wall!  100000 bottles of beer!  Take one down!  Pass it around!  99999 bottles of beer on the wall!"
. . .
"10000 bottles of beer on the wall! 10000 bottles of beer!  Take one down! Pass it around!  9999 bottles of beer on the wall!"
. . .
"100 bottles of beer on the wall!  100 bottles of beer! Take one down!  Pass it around!  99 bottles of beer on the wall!  Oh my fucking god is this going to take forever!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Dammit...
One of the fandom's older better artists, Denial-is-tragic recently DNPed on here and appears to have deactivated his DA. His art went back as far as the first few pages of this website, 2012.

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554e9bd2636872124c4f1400#post_554e9bd2636872124c4f1400
I don't know...
I saw his name on the DNP list's latest update and went to check him out by source. Turned out he also deactivated his account.

"Some of his art is still on Bronibooru":http://www.bronibooru.com/posts?utf8=%E2%9C%93&tags=denial-is-tragic+
I recommend people save as much as they can before those disappear as well. Even though I do NOT like Bronibooru anymore than anyone else here.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554e9e5b63687261633c3f00#post_554e9e5b63687261633c3f00
It's run by the same people on The Roundstable, who were originally from SomethingAwful. An SJW cesspit.

They are so strict that they don't allow comics and anthros to be allowed on the image board, due to "risk of attracting 'neckbeards' onto their site".
